self.title: CDISC SDTM Reason Treatment Not Administered Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the reason the treatment was not administered.
name: Reason Treatment Not Administered
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Reason Treatment Not Administered Terminology

terms.definition: The medication is no longer held or possessed by the subject and is incapable of being recovered or regained.
To decline to do, accept, give, or allow something.
The act of changing your residence or place of business.
